text: Faizabad City Bus Depot is a UP Roadways Bus Depot in Faizabad, Uttar Pradesh, India. It is the central bus stand for the Uttar Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation, and have lines running for majority of other destinations in UP and further north. Major cities connected by direct bus are Delhi, Jaipur, Etawah, Agra, Mathura, Ajmer, etc. There is Rajasthan Roadways Deluxe, Super deluxe and AC buses as well as private travels also available from the major cities. ==References== Category:Bus stations in Uttar Pradesh Category:1947 establishments in India Category:Transport in Faizabad Category:Buildings and structures in Faizabad
title: Faizabad Bus Depot
